A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It only took me to the end of the 3rd scene to realize that this was going to be a horrible movie from beginning to end. Every time I thought it couldn’t get worse\, it did. Di$ney obviously only cares about making money and not about its fan base. All I wanted was a Star Wars film written and produced by Star Wars fans\, for Star Wars fans. What we got was absolute garbage. If you love the original trilogy like it do\, don’t waste your money on this movie.
